title: Ivan Spychka
text:
Ivan Spychka (; born 18 January 1991) is a <a href="Ukrainians">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who currently plays in Armenia for <a href="FC%20Ararat%20Yerevan">FC Ararat Yerevan</a>.
Club career.
Spychka is a product of the different Dnipropetrovsk youth sportive school systems. Then he transferred to FC Metalurh Zaporizhzhia youth sportive school and became a member of the main team. He made his debut in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> in the match against <a href="FC%20Volyn%20Lutsk">FC Volyn Lutsk</a> on 28 November 2010. In August 2013 he signed a contract with FC Dynamo-2 and left this club in June 2015.
